bibl.title: The Eponymous Priests of 234/3 B.C.
bibl.note: P. Amst. Inv. 250 (Arsinoites, 21.6.233 B.C.) partly preserves the name of the eponymous priests of 234/3 and enables us to give the Greek rendering of their names and father's names which were till now only known from 2 Demotic texts. - Will be published in P. Amst. II.
bibl.seg: Sijpesteijn Pieter Johannes, The Eponymous Priests of 234/3 B.C.

P. Amst. Inv. 250 (Arsinoites, 21.6.233 B.C.) partly preserves the name of the eponymous priests of 234/3 and enables us to give the Greek rendering of their names and father's names which were till now only known from 2 Demotic texts. - Will be published in P. Amst. II.
